name: Kingdom Two Crowns
short_description: A side-scrolling micro-strategy game with a stunning pixel-art world.
description: In Kingdom Two Crowns, players must work to build their kingdom and defend it from the mysterious Greed. Play solo or in cooperative multiplayer, expand your lands, and discover hidden secrets.

system_requirements.gpu: Intel HD 4000 / GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon R7 370
